product_name: Alite Boa Pod Dispenser Pouch - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Unlike other bulky or fussy dog-poop bag dispensers, the ultralight Boa Pod Dispenser Pouch attachment has a sleek profile and attaches to any existing collar, leash or belt loop for ease of use. Stash your waste bags inside the pod and pull them out 1 at a time through the slit in the side of the pod. Ripstop nylon fabric is quick-drying and easy to clean. Includes a stash pocket for keys and dog treats. Attach a light (not included) to the loop for nighttime walks. Closeout.
short_description: Unlike other bulky or fussy dog-poop bag dispensers, the ultralight Boa Pod Dispenser Pouch attachment has a sleek profile and attaches to any existing collar, leash or belt loop for ease of use.
